attributes.action: Establish a Transitional Government in DR Congo by force ASAP
attributes.additional_details: Today, those who helped President Joseph Kabila to take power in the DR Congo cannot control him anymore and cannot get rid of him; Joseph Kabila takes advantage of the division of the opposition and the insecurity to maintain himself in power, their will be not election this years. the congolese opposition is corrupted. no body to trust, Violence continues in Beni, North Kivu, clashes between Congolese and Ugandan rebels, civilians are ambushed every day, Insecurity exasperates all inhabitants
attributes.background: Proposal of an international transitional government with Mr Michael Jackson (Previously known as PAPY ELUNGU) Leader of the group NEW WORLD POWER, to be established as President of the DR Congo and a transitional government by the support of the USA, UK, ASAP before the conflict spreads.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it's about something that UK Government or Parliament is not responsible for.

You could start a new petition calling on the UK Government to urge the UN to take action to ensure free and fair elections in the DR Congo if that is something you would like to see happen.
